column4: Hi everyone, a guy I knows keeps putting ubuntu down and it's really starting to get annoying. He is a fedora fan and says ubuntu stole fedoras theme and never gave them any credit. I don't know if this is true or not because I have yet to try fedora core. However, if this is true can anyone point me to some ubuntu credits page or something? To shut him up basically?
well, he said took fedoras look and made it brown
I think ubuntu is great, I have nothing against it really
let him first show the fedore(tm?) theme ?
